Carroll Rogé is the leader of this intentionally small and thoughtful marketing agency serving Tyler, TX, and beyond. He’s a writer, designer, and strategist with decades of experience leading the marketing for organizations, large and small. He holds an MBA, has won awards and taught university-level marketing courses. 

What’s important to you, however, is not what’s been done in the past. It’s what we can do for you now and in the future. Rogé Marketing understands business and communication. We appreciate the absolutely critical need for strategy and for honesty. Our main goal is not to get business for Rogé Marketing; our overarching priority is seeing that our clients get results. If you’ve used an agency before and didn’t have a good experience, it’s probably because your agency lost sight of that.

Strategic support, reasonable rates

Strategic planning (SWOT analysis, mission, goals, customer ID, tactics, etc.)

Marketing communications auditing (assessing the effectiveness of your outreach)

Traditional media (newspaper, radio, outdoor, direct mail, and printed materials, etc.)

Digital marketing

The Institute of Teaching Training and Education (IKIP) Muhammadiyah Yogyakarta as a Higher Education Institution was the development of Jakarta MuhammadiyahÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Faculty of Teacher Training and Education (FKIP) based in Yogyakarta, which was established on November 18, 1960. FKIP Muhamadiyah course was the continuation of BI Muhammadiyah in Yogyakarta in 1957. The course had a BI Sciences Department, Civic Law and Economics then. On 19 December 1994 with the decree (SK)of Minister of Education and Culture of the Republic of Indonesia Number: 102 / D0/1994 it was determined that IKIP Muhamadiyah Yogyakarta was changed into Ahmad Dahlan University.

Your website has out of date content that you don't know how to update, it loads slowly, and it's difficult to manage.

If your website isn’t generating leads, creating fans, or converting visitors into customers, it’s not doing its job. We design your site to achieve the goals that matter most to your business.

Over 50% of the web is viewed from a mobile device. We make sure your website looks great on any screen size.

Maintaining a website is hard work. That’s why we do it for you. We make sure it stays updated, secure, and running smoothly.

Contact us today to find out how we can help you with your specific needs and goals for your business.

column119:
Who We Are
We are a team of industry-leading digital marketers, publicists, and advisors that are pooling their experience together to deliver research-centered, practical strategies to the blockchain space and beyond. 

Our Approach 
You’ll find from the first conversation that we are not your typical full-service agency that is going to give you a cookie-cutter template. We look at your project as a story and a dream, then we bring it to life. Why? Investors are getting savvy and much more sophisticated. ICO’s aren’t a novelty any longer. Your messaging must show them that you are a legitimate business that stands out and is worth investing in. This is where most fail.

Most agencies take the easy way out and use the exact same playbook to launch every plan. While we utilize many of the same 200 channels in every project we launch, it’s our research-driven, individualized approach that will win you over. Our cutting edge and avant-garde approach to systematic publicity will give your project the awareness, support, and validation that it needs to win over investors and draw attention from mainstream communities.

column105: 3419 Westminster Ave, Dallas, TX, United States
column119:
There are many digital marketing agencies out there. They are selling mobile apps, Facebook likes and web traffic, capitalizing the general excitement companies have around the digital era. But companies are viewing digital technology as a hobby, they have forgotten that technology shouldn’t be an island: It should be their biggest weapon to grow, to be more efficient, to better satisfy their clients and to beat their competitors. 

So Mambo is not a digital marketing agency: we don’t sell likes, we don’t sell campaigns. We sell results, we sell transformation and we are trying to give technology the place it deserves within companies. Of course, we build apps, eCommerce and social media solutions, but those are just our tools to make a meaningful impact. We are trying to transform the way companies work, communicate, sell, attract and retain talent and clients, perform customer service so our clients must measure our service on impact, not on likes, visits or downloads. Many times a company will come to us and say they want an app but when we ask why and dig deeper, perhaps they didn’t need an app in the first place and we turn down the opportunity. In the short term it may look like we are sacrificing revenue but this way we remain loyal to our value proposition and earn our client’s trust and respect.

P&G, Scotiabank, Movistar, 3M and Sura are amongst our transformation partners in Latin America.

column105: 3419 Westminster Ave, Dallas, TX, United States
column119:
There are many digital marketing agencies out there. They are selling mobile apps, Facebook likes and web traffic, capitalizing the general excitement companies have around the digital era. But companies are viewing digital technology as a hobby, they have forgotten that technology shouldn’t be an island: It should be their biggest weapon to grow, to be more efficient, to better satisfy their clients and to beat their competitors. 

So Mambo is not a digital marketing agency: we don’t sell likes, we don’t sell campaigns. We sell results, we sell transformation and we are trying to give technology the place it deserves within companies. Of course, we build apps, eCommerce and social media solutions, but those are just our tools to make a meaningful impact. We are trying to transform the way companies work, communicate, sell, attract and retain talent and clients, perform customer service so our clients must measure our service on impact, not on likes, visits or downloads. Many times a company will come to us and say they want an app but when we ask why and dig deeper, perhaps they didn’t need an app in the first place and we turn down the opportunity. In the short term it may look like we are sacrificing revenue but this way we remain loyal to our value proposition and earn our client’s trust and respect.

P&G, Scotiabank, Movistar, 3M and Sura are amongst our transformation partners in Latin America.

column119:
Who We Are-

UNIFI Commerce is making things happen. Our result-driven digital marketing agency is based in the heart of Dallas, Texas. We specialize in creating online marketing strategies for companies and clients all across the globe. At UNIFI, we believe that strong relationships generate strong results. Schedule a consultation with us today. Let us show you how we can make your company more prominent and more profitable.

What We Do-

Together we create the blueprint, then you let UNIFI do the building. In our busy world, we understand that building a formal detailed marketing strategy can be time-consuming, costly and stressful. UNIFI takes away the hassle by doing the heavy lifting for you. We build a custom-made game plan for your company and we execute it effectively. Following a partnership with UNIFI, you can sit back and take it easy while we build your internet empire.

Why We Do It-

There are currently 3.196 billion people in the world that utilize social media. To put that into perspective, that is 42% of the entire global population. On the flip side, there are over 200 million companies in the world but less than 2% of these companies effectively utilize digital & social media marketing. This is because most have no formal strategy.
UNIFI plans to change this trend. We create your master plan and utilize our E-Optimization approach to produce real results. 

How We Do It-

E-Optimization is the process of integrating tracking, analysis, conversions, and content. It is a strategic approach that UNIFI Commerce utilizes to produces traffic and generates quality leads for your company. Our innovative E-Optimization tactics are the catalyst for unlocking the true marketing potential for your company. 

Connect With UNIFI

We would love to hear from you. We are accepting emails 24/7 to find companies and clients who can greatly benefit from the services. Contact us at Connect@UNIFIcommerce.com.

We aren’t a traditional marketing agency, but we’ve partnered with some to execute their marketing strategies and bring their ideas to life on behalf of our enterprise-marketing clients. And we’re not a temp staffing company either, though we’re sometimes confused for one.

We’re a hybrid – a new kind of creative marketing firm whose employees and contractors often work onsite at our clients’ offices. Or maybe they work remotely. Or maybe a mix of both. It’s different for every client we serve.

If you are looking for an agency that can adapt to meet your special needs, you’ve found the right shop. Whether it’s a full-service creative team working onsite at your offices or one-off marcom project support, Liaison can help.

At our core, Liaison is about solving problems. Whether it’s the immediate problem of a rapidly approaching deadline or the larger challenge of how to produce marcom collateral quickly and cost-effectively, we want to help. We bring a specialized set of tools – our unique service offerings and desire to serve – to every job.

In our role as a wholesale broker, we have many carrier relationships so that we can provide alternatives to our clients for the products and services that we offer. A TEAM THAT FIGHTS FOR YOU
The Carlson Law Firm has been representing and protecting clients across the nation since 1976. During this time, we have built a reputation for success and have received numerous awards. Our firm is committed to delivering exceptional service and representation but more importantly, we provide you with an experienced team that has your back, 100%. Whether you are looking for assistance in personal injury, defective products, dangerous drugs, bankruptcy, criminal defense, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse, maritime injury or family law, you can be confident about placing your trust in our proven legal team.

THE CARLSON DIFFERENCE
The Carlson Law Firm provides the personalized representation that you would expect from a small firm, but with the benefit of a large network of experienced professionals, including investigators, former police officers, legal nurses, medical experts, crash scene experts and other knowledgeable staff members. Regardless of the complexity of the legal challenges you face, we can help; our firm employs local and statewide resources from a team of professionals capable of helping you through difficult times. Carlson Law Firm clients can rest assured that their rights will be fiercely protected from their initial free consultation to the final resolution of their personal injury cases.

column105: Austin, United States
column119: Gay Gaddis is the founder of T3, an innovative digital and marketing agency that rose to national prominence under her leadership for over 30 years, acquired by LRW Group in 2019. An active spokesperson, artist and writer, Gaddis is the celebrated author of Cowgirl Power: How to Kick Ass in Business & Life and is a regular contributor to Forbes and part of Fortune’s Powerful Women Insider Network. She has received numerous awards including Fast Company’s “Top 25 Women Business Builders,” Inc. Magazine’s “Top 10 Entrepreneurs of the Year” and C200’s Luminary Award for Entrepreneurial Excellence. Gaddis is the first female Chairman of the Texas Business Leadership Council, former Chairman of The Committee of 200 (C200), immediate past board member for Monotype Imaging Holdings, Inc. and is on the Board of Directors of the Texas Cultural Trust and The University of Texas’ alumni association Texas Exes. As an artist, Gaddis’ bold and vibrant paintings have been shown in several prestigious galleries around the country including a solo show at The Curator Gallery in New York City, featured in Paper Magazine and by Texas Monthly magazine naming Gaddis as one of the “Top Ten Artists to Collect Now.” Gaddis and her husband own and operate the Double Heart Ranch in the Texas Hill Country which houses their most recent endeavor, Fossil Ridge Creative Center, a retreat venue for thinking, creativity and collaboration.

column119:
The First Digital Marketing Agency
Exclusively for Life Science Companies
Created by a Team of Scientists and Digital Marketers

THE DIFFERENCE
57% of life scientists use search engines as the #1 source for finding new products and services. If your business is lacking a strong online presence during this digital era, then you have good reason to be concerned about the future of your business.

Digital marketing for life science companies is our expertise. If you’re looking to generate more brand equity, drive more quality leads and increase traffic online with the most cutting edge digital marketing strategy available, you’ve come to the right place.

Want to see our work for yourself? View some of our selected case studies below for SEO, SEM, Web Development, Web Design and Conversion Optimization.

OUR MISSION
Nothing makes us more proud than seeing your company succeed above and beyond expectations. For many companies, we’ve been there from the start and helped grow them from their first investment to IPO or major acquisition. That being said, we are very selective with the life science companies that we market with. In order for us to achieve our mission of providing the highest quality and most impactful services possible, we only work with companies that share our passion for success.

column105: 12377 Merit Drive Suite 800, Dallas, TX, United States
column119:
In 2019, MCC became a wholly owned subsidiary of Mod Op, a digital marketing agency with offices across the U.S. and Panama.

With so much riding on marketing communications, brands need an agency partner with expertise and a long track record of results. Dallas-based MCC, now Mod Op Dallas, believes brands should engage customers with a balanced story of logic and emotion. Mod Op Dallas has partnered with B2B and B2C clients to provide full-service, integrated advertising, public relations and social media marketing. The agency’s experience ranges from technology, energy, insurance and real estate to finance, retail, health, security and entertainment. 

Mod Op Dallas has helped companies in virtually every industry achieve their business objectives through better marketing communications. The agency’s experience is broad and, in several areas, deep. Originally founded to serve high-tech clients, the company has since expanded its scope with the technology space continuing to be one of its strong suits. Mod Op Dallas has experience serving these industries and more:

-	Consumer Electronics
-	Embedded Products
-	Energy
-	Entertainment
-	Enterprise IT
-	Financial Services
-	Network Carrier Infrastructure
-	Security

column119: We help you grow your brand by developing and executing strategic marketing campaigns and tactics catered to your specific target audience to establish consumer connection and increase your revenue. We are Medium Giant — a uniquely positioned company with local, regional, and national offices in Dallas, Denver, and Tulsa.

We have built a model that combines our multiple divisions into one unified, innovative vision, including our strategic digital marketing agency; our legacy advertising organization and marketer of The Dallas Morning News; and our creative agency.

We are focused on connecting businesses with the right consumers at the right time and the right place with a full portfolio of media, marketing, and creative capabilities.

Making these connections is our “why.”

Medium Giant clients trust us with their brands. That means we stop at nothing to reach every relevant audience, deliver results, and show a clear return on their investment.

column105: 526 Kingwood Drive, Houston, TX 77339, United States
column119:
DesignAgency is a global award-winning Interior Design firm with a talent for envisioning environments and brands.

Managed by partners and long-time friends Allen Chan, Matt Davis and Anwar Mekhayech, the studio unites Interior Design, Architectural Concepting, Strategic Branding with Visual Communication in a unique and innovative way. With an international portfolio of projects working for leading companies, developers, restauranteurs, retailers and hoteliers, each client works directly with one or more of our partners, reflecting our belief that great design requires leadership, focus and commitment. 

Our success is rooted in our collaborative and consultative approach by which our multidisciplinary team of talented design professionals engage internally with the partners and clients to craft innovative, custom designed spaces that help elevate the consumer experience. We embrace the full spectrum of design typologies and remain open to innovative ideas, technologies and new creative design approaches that will enable us to bring the best solutions forward to our clients.
